title: Game crashing and wont reconnect after champ select.
body: Nothing is working, please help, pleaseee :(

replies.body:
Hey there,

Are you running any third party applications alongside league? (lolreplay, etc)

Could you try [running a client repair](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq6) for me.
